relation: Cellebrum offers SMSC solution with industry best features with highly scalable & modular architecture. It offers true `one-box' solution to give network operator a competitive edge over others. It can directly be integrated with all of its SMS based and Voice based service with exceptional speed and ease. For operators with heavy short messaging traffic, Cellebrum offers an innovative load sharing solution, where the Mobile Switching Centre (MSC) shares the load for several Short Message Service Centre (SMSC) units. This solution enables a server cluster to be seen as a single large SMSC by the users. This gives easy and fast scaling of SMSC capacity just by adding server units.
Clickatell has a number of products and services that can assist you with sending bulk SMS messages.

HSL's messaging gateway allows SMS messages generated from a software application to be routed to a mobile telephone quickly, reliably and cost effectively. There are four ways in which clients can use the service to send SMS messages: SMTP (e-mail), SMPP (Short Message Peer to Peer), HTTP (Hypertext Transfer Protocol, Web Server (SOAP/XML).

mBlox�s mobile messaging delivery-services � sometimes referred to as bulk SMS services � allow you to deliver data to and receive data from mobile handsets in over 180 countries around the world. mBlox�s mobile delivery products can access approximately 95% of the mobile subscribers around the world; that�s almost 2 billion people! Thanks to being user-friendly, cheap and all but ubiquitous, the main delivery mechanism for mobile data today is still bulk SMS. As the world�s largest application-to-person SMS delivery network provider, mBlox delivers well over half a billion SMS messages per year.

Mobile marketing is being used by more and more companies to interact with their customers. MPP provides a range of mobile marketing solutions that enable customer interaction to be more immediate and of course more profitable.

MX Telecom can send Bulk SMS to a large number of destinations throughout the world, connecting to almost all GSM networks, & many non-GSM networks. Delivery reports and message concatenation are both supported, as well as other forms of SMS such as WAP Push and various "Smart Messages". The service is fast, reliable, and easy to use. Once submitted to the SMS Gateway, all messages will be sent out in seconds.

Phonenumbers4u Running Reverse Billing SMS services can generate your business vast amounts of additional revenue!, with an extensive range of Premium SMS services you're sure to find a service that your customers are just going to love! For a one off investment of L59.99 you receive your choice of service, password protected online account & choice of keyword. With our SMS services there are NO minimum traffic levels & NO ongoing charges inc NO shortcode & keyword rental charges

Authorized users of the Quios Messaging Platform can programmatically submit messages for delivery to handsets worldwide through a standard SMPP stream. Quios is ideal for sending large numbers of SMSs directly from a database or other content provider application. The SMPP Interface to the Quios Messaging Platform conforms to the SMPP Protocol Specification v3.4.

sms2email sms2email specialise in UK based campaigns, basically bulk and scheduled SMS message sending. It has support for SMS Premium rate billing (short codes), HTTP/HTTPS POST SMS/MMS gateway, GSM sim hosting (incoming SMS messages), SMPP v3.3 and v3.4 compliant, SMS, MMS, WAP Push messaging for business, XML/SOAP !

TextOver TextOver specialise in bulk sms services for small businesses and have developed a selection of software that allows any size business to begin sending sms, without spending large amounts on setup. Almost all of the standard integration methods have no setup costs. TextOver also have competitive pricing for our bulk messages.

TynTec offers a complete range of messaging services for SMS reselling, optimization and high quality of SMS routing to mobile service providers such as mobile operators, MVNOs, MVNEs, mobile content providers, SMS aggregators and resellers. All offered services by TynTec are tailored according to enterprise-quality standards. TynTec�s SMS services are based on its SS7 connectivity and a proprietary SMS-C (Short Message Service Center), which is a scalable platform to perform the highest quality messaging in delivering secure and reliable SMS services.

We are able to enable SMS & Fax broadcast services via a variety of interfaces (XML-RPC, HTTP, SMPP, Java, Com Object and Command Line). we We also offer free broadcast management tools such as our windows message client and SMS blaster.

WIN is a dynamic enabler of entertainment, information and interaction services in the ever-evolving mobile media environment. Through continuous innovation, we help Europe's leading content owners, mobile operators, corporate enterprises and media and entertainment corporations engage customers, create brand loyalty, maximise revenues and reduce costs.

World-Text services include a SMS (Short Message Service) gateway providing many different methods for inbound and outbound SMS handling, Web Design and Hosting and Advanced Domain/Email hosting services which include Spam and Virus filtering.
